Contacts API documentation¶

Add your content using reStructuredText syntax. See the reStructuredText documentation for details.

Contacts API main¶

main.launch(app: FastAPI)¶

Connecting the cache to the system for determining limits on the number of requests.

Parameters:

app (FastAPI) – Application object.

async main.root(db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)) → dict¶

Endpoint for determining application readiness.

Parameters:

db (AsyncSession) – Database connection.

Returns:

Welcome message when ready. Otherwise, an error message is displayed.

Return type:

dict

Contacts API repository Users¶

async src.repository.users.avatar(email: str, url: str, db: AsyncSession) → Response¶

Setting a link to a user’s avatar.

Parameters:

  • email (str) – The e-mail address of the user whose avatar needs to be specified.

  • url (str) – The web address of the image that represents the user’s image.

  • db (AsyncSession) – Database connection.

Returns:

The entity of a particular user if the user was successfully found at the specified email address.

Return type:

Response

async src.repository.users.create(body: UserRequest, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)) → Response¶

Create a new user based on the provided email address and password.

Parameters:

  • body (UserRequest) – A couple of fields are required to create an entity.

  • db (AsyncSession) – Database connection.

Returns:

The part of the created entity that contains the ID and email address.

Return type:

Response

async src.repository.users.update(user: User, db: AsyncSession, revoke: bool = False) → TokenSchema | None¶

Making changes to one or more fields of an existing user.

Parameters:

  • user (User) – A set of all fields from the user model for the database.

  • db (AsyncSession) – Database connection.

  • revoke (bool) – Indication that the refresh token must be reset.

Returns:

The access and update token and their type if the entity was successfully updated.

Return type:

TokenSchema | None

async src.repository.users.verify(email: str, db: AsyncSession) → None¶

The process of marking a user as one whose email address has been verified.

Parameters:

  • email (str) – Email address of an existing user.

  • db (AsyncSession) – Database connection.
